<template>
    <body>
        <HeaderComponent />

        <FooterComponent />
    </body>
</template>

<script>
import HeaderComponent from '@/components/HeaderComponent.vue';
import FooterComponent from '@/components/FooterComponent.vue';

export default {
    components: {
        HeaderComponent,
        FooterComponent,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            nombreTitular: '',
            numeroCuenta: '',
            fechaVencimiento: '',
            codigoVerificacion: '',
            aceptaTerminos: false
        }
    },
    methods: {

    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
form {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
}

input,
label {
    margin: 5px 0;
}

.btn1 {
    background: #8BC34A;
}

.btn1:hover {
    color: white;
}

footer {
    margin-top: 30px;
}

h1{
    font-family:Cambria, Cochin, Georgia, Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;
    color: black;
    text-shadow: 5px 0px 3px whitesmoke;;
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    line-height: 1.2;
}
body {
    background-image: url('../assets/oficios.jpg');
    background-size: cover;
    position: relative;
}

.hoja {
    background: #a5a5a5dc;
    width: 40%;
    margin: 0 auto; /* Para centrar el contenedor horizontalmente */
}

@media screen and (max-width: 575.98px) {
    /* Pantallas peque√±as */
    .hoja {
        width: 90%;
    }
}

@media screen and (min-width: 576px) {
    /* Pantallas medianas y grandes */
    .hoja {
        width: 40%;
    }
}
</style>
